name: Willow Townhouse
address: 12 Willow Lane, New Town, Kolkata, WB
description: Willow Townhouse offers a serene lifestyle in the heart of New Town, Kolkata. Designed for comfort and elegance, this 3-bedroom home features spacious interiors, premium fittings, and ample natural light. Its modern kitchen, landscaped surroundings, and easy access to schools, shopping, and public transport make it ideal for families. The townhouse’s peaceful neighborhood combines contemporary living with everyday convenience.

name: Garden View Townhouse
description: A spacious 4-bedroom townhouse in the rapidly developing area of Rajarhat. Features include a dedicated garden area, modern fittings, and a focus on natural light and ventilation. Located close to major IT hubs and expressways, it promises a high-quality, convenient lifestyle for modern families.

name: Orchid Lane Townhouse
description: This charming resale property in a prime Pune location is ready for immediate occupancy. A well-maintained 3 BHK unit with comfortable living spaces and access to community amenities. Perfect for those seeking a value-for-money home with a proven track record.

name: Maple Street Townhouse
description: Elegant and ready-to-move 3 BHK townhouse in a quiet, upscale neighborhood of Bengaluru. Boasts modern architectural design, high-quality finishes, and proximity to the city’s best schools and tech parks. A perfect blend of style and suburban peace.

name: Sunset Villas Townhouse
address: Sunset Villas, Anna Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
description: An exciting opportunity to customize your dream home. This 4-bedroom townhouse is currently under construction in the sought-after Anna Nagar locality. It promises spacious living, premium amenities, and a contemporary design tailored for the future homeowner.

name: Rosewood Enclave Townhouse
description: A luxury 4 BHK townhouse in Dwarka, Delhi, offering an expansive 1750 sq ft of carpet area. Ready for immediate occupancy, it features top-tier security, dedicated parking, and is located in a well-established, premium residential enclave.

name: Skyline Heights Penthouse
address: Skyline Heights, Salt Lake, Kolkata, WB
description: Experience luxury at its peak with this ready-to-move 4 BHK penthouse offering stunning views of Salt Lake, Kolkata. Features a private terrace, high-end marble flooring, and centralized air conditioning. This is urban living redefined.

name: Cloud Nine Tower Penthouse
address: Cloud Nine Tower, Ballygunge, Kolkata, WB
description: A premier 5 BHK under-construction penthouse in the coveted Ballygunge area. This property offers the chance to select personalized interior finishes and a grand living experience with unparalleled city vistas from a high-rise tower.

name: Vista Point Penthouse
address: Vista Point, Park Street, Kolkata, WB
description: A rare resale opportunity for a sprawling 5 BHK penthouse right off Park Street. This home includes two fully-equipped kitchens, extensive balcony space, and a history of prestigious residency in a landmark building.

name: Zenith Tower Penthouse
address: Zenith Tower, EM Bypass, Kolkata, WB
description: Ready-to-move 4 BHK penthouse strategically located on the EM Bypass, ensuring excellent connectivity. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for panoramic views, a modern modular kitchen, and access to all high-rise amenities.

name: Ocean Crest Penthouse
address: Ocean Crest, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra
description: An unparalleled 5 BHK penthouse in the elite Bandra West area, offering spectacular sea views. This ready-to-move luxury residence is designed with bespoke interiors and an entertainer’s dream layout, including a massive private deck.

name: Skyview Residences Penthouse
description: Pre-launch opportunity for a grand 4 BHK penthouse in the vibrant Indiranagar locality. This under-construction project promises premium finishes, state-of-the-art security, and a community known for its sophisticated residents.

name: Green Residency Apartment
description: Affordable and well-maintained 2 BHK resale apartment in Barrackpore. Ideal for first-time homebuyers or small families, offering a peaceful residential environment and excellent local connectivity.

name: Sunrise Apartments
description: Ready-to-move 3 BHK apartment offering a comfortable, spacious living area in Kestopur. The complex provides 24/7 security, community hall access, and is strategically located near major public transport routes.

name: Lotus Enclave Apartment
address: Lotus Enclave, Dum Dum, Kolkata, WB
description: A valuable resale property near the Dum Dum metro station. This 2 BHK apartment is a fantastic investment, featuring well-lit rooms, functional layouts, and a neighborhood with strong community ties.

name: Harmony Towers Apartment
description: Invest in a future home with this under-construction 3 BHK apartment in Barasat. Located in a promising development, it offers modern living, dedicated resident facilities, and excellent potential for property value appreciation.

name: Silver Springs Apartment
address: Silver Springs, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra
description: Ready-to-move 3 BHK in the bustling hub of Andheri East. This apartment is perfect for working professionals, offering swift access to corporate offices, the airport, and all key city landmarks.

name: Lakeview Apartments
description: Modern 2 BHK apartment under construction in the sought-after Koramangala area. Promises a lifestyle with a view, proximity to tech parks, and a vibrant social scene, making it ideal for young urban families.

name: Riverside Retreat Farmhouse
description: A magnificent 5 BHK resale farmhouse located on the banks of the river near Chandannagar. Boasts sprawling grounds, a private pool area, and luxurious interiors—a perfect weekend getaway or primary residence.

name: Mango Grove Estate Farmhouse
description: A ready-to-move 6 BHK estate in the cultural heart of Shantiniketan. The property features extensive mango groves, classic architectural design, and immense space for large gatherings and peaceful living.

name: Palm View Villa Farmhouse
address: Palm View Villa, Diamond Harbour, WB
description: Under-construction 4 BHK farmhouse near Diamond Harbour. This property is being developed with an emphasis on coastal luxury, offering ample space and serene views, customizable to your taste.

name: Serenity Acres Farmhouse
description: Massive 6 BHK ready-to-move farmhouse in the green landscapes of Bolpur. It is an ideal investment for luxury rural living, complete with manicured gardens and high-end security systems.

name: Whispering Pines Farmhouse
description: This stunning 5 BHK resale farmhouse in Lonavala’s hills offers breathtaking valley views and cool weather. Features include wooden paneling, a fireplace, and a large outdoor patio for relaxation.

name: Coconut Grove Estate Farmhouse
address: Coconut Grove Estate, ECR Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
description: An expansive 6 BHK beach-side farmhouse on ECR Road, Chennai. This ready-to-move property provides direct beach access, a coconut plantation, and a true resort-like living experience.
